name: fetch
description: A server that flexibly fetches HTML, JSON, Markdown, or plaintext.

examples.title: Fetch HTML
examples.description: Fetch a website and return the content as HTML

examples.title: Fetch JSON
examples.description: Fetch a JSON file from a URL

examples.title: Fetch Plain Text
examples.description: Fetch a website and return the content as plain text

examples.title: Fetch Markdown
examples.description: Fetch a website and return the content as Markdown

url.description: URL of the website to fetch

headers.description: Custom headers to include in the request
